title: Refuge of Delayed Souls
description: Refuge of Delayed Souls or - RoYds - as the story has become affectionately known - is a complex, paranormal mystery which encompasses multiple timelines and intertwining stories. Volume 1 ~ RoYds ~ Elizabeth Whyte returns to Whituth following a period of absence and is keen to reprise her role within a mysterious Agency known as RoYds.
author: Miladysa
